Take a snack break with the
kids this afternoon. Serve
lemonade with pineapple stick
"stirrers" and pass a tray of
spicy Cinnamon Drops. For
about 5 dozen Pinch cookies,
sift together 312 cups sifted en-
riched flour, * teaspoon salt
and p teaspoon soda. Cream
together p cup shortening and
u cup sugar until light and
fluffy. Add 1 cup molasses and
1 beaten egg. Beat thoroughly
Blend in 3 tablespoons water.
Add flour mixture to creamed
mixture gradually, mixing well.
Dough will be soft. Combine
% cup sugar and 2 teaspoons
cinnamon Drop dough by
rounded teaspoonfuls into Gin
namon sugar. then place on
CREASED baking sheet Bake in
moderate oven (35O'F.) IL to
Is minutes.

NEW YORK-Quinton E. Baker,
NAACP North Carolina State
Youth Conference president, re-
ceived the Weintraub Memorial
Award of $500.


The award is presented to a
young man or woman under Is
for outstanding personal cour-
age in the cause of human rights
or civil liberties" was given
to Mr.. Baker, 20, for his in
tegration activities in his home
state of North Carolina.


In his acceptance remarks,
Mr.. Baker, senior at North
Carolina College In Durham, said
he was deeply honored" tohave
been chosen to receive the gift
because "many people have done
more than L.

The Shrine Auditorium has
been chosen by Jehovah's Wit
nessesi for the site Of their cir
cult assembly to be held May
22-24. Michele Wargo. circuit
superM sor in Phoenix said, "The
Shrine Auditorium will be trans
formed into one huge Kingdom
Hall to accommodate the 1000
expected to attend from Is con-
gregations in Phoenix and the
surrounding communities of
Avondale, Tempe. Chandler and
Sunnyslorxs."


Wargo also said, "This assem-
bly, Is not a revival. but spe-
cial educational program dealing
with the art of Bible teaching
and featuring practical ways to
improve our door to door teaching
methods"


John P. Sutherland, Brooklyn,
N. Y. District Supervisor will
be the key speaker for the event.
He has been an ordained minis
ter for % years and is a grad
uate of the Watchtower Bible
School of Gilt,ad at South Lans-
ing, New York. Mr.. Sutherland
and his wife, Ruth, have travelled
in many parts of the United States
and he served as chairman for
the Pasadena segment of the
Around the World International
Everlasting G,3od News Assem-
bly, of Jehovah's. Witnesses" this
past summer.

LOS ANGELES :. Three Negro
musicians played with the Acad1
envy Awards show orchestra.


Appearing on the. spectacular
show we're Toni Robins on, harp
ist; William Green, saxophonist
and Buddy Collete saxophonist.

Boy Scouts exhibition held last weekend the
fairgrounds.


Top Troop Jackson School displaying
United States Materials provided by Ladlows Home
Furnishings.


Anthony Watson Donovan Sovall,
mother, prepare demonstration.


phooThoma E. Wilson, is surrounded by
er Arizona Our National Heritage project
Troop members Jake Thomas Herverrt Scott Paul
Hernandez Scott, Roosevelt Woods, , Donald Oliver,
Larry Mathews and Glen Calvin
This troop represented Bethune School.

Recipe OF


The Week
full articles.article:
Take a snack break with the
kids this afternoon. Serve
lemonade with pineapple stick
"stirrers" and pass a tray of
spicy Cinnamon Drops. For
about 5 dozen Pinch cookies,
sift together 312 cups sifted en-
riched flour, * teaspoon salt
and p teaspoon soda. Cream
together p cup shortening and
u cup sugar until light and
fluffy. Add 1 cup molasses and
1 beaten egg. Beat thoroughly
Blend in 3 tablespoons water.
Add flour mixture to creamed
mixture gradually, mixing well.
Dough will be soft. Combine
% cup sugar and 2 teaspoons
cinnamon Drop dough by
rounded teaspoonfuls into Gin
namon sugar. then place on
CREASED baking sheet Bake in
moderate oven (35O'F.) IL to
Is minutes.

Jehovah s Witnesses
To Meet
